name: Novi Sad
fun_fact: Fun fact: Novi Sad hosts EXIT Festival in the Petrovaradin Fortress - once voted the best European music festival, it takes place inside an 18th-century Hapsburg fortress with 16km of underground tunnels and over 200,000 annual attendees!
